name: California Transition Assistance Program (CalTAP)
description: Free transition assistance connecting veterans to benefits, education, employment, and entrepreneurship resources
fullDescription: CalTAP connects transitioning service members and veterans with their earned federal and state benefits through five pathways - Core Curriculum, Education, Employment, Entrepreneurship, and Service Providers. Since 2017, CalTAP has served over 12,000 veterans at military installations and college campuses.
whatTheyOffer:
- Benefits education and navigation
- Employment and career services
- Education pathway guidance
- Entrepreneurship resources
- Connection to local service providers
- Continued support as needs change
howToGetIt:
1. Attend a CalTAP workshop at a military installation
2. Or visit a CalTAP session at a California college campus
3. Complete intake and needs assessment
4. Connect with local veteran service providers
5. Receive ongoing support and referrals
